item.description:
Skip breakfast and don't eat lunch, it's time for an all sugar day! And of course the most important day in all of Rhode Island's history, it's the Great Cupcake Championship!

Numerous confectionery cupcakery establishments will battle for the supreme title of ultimate cupcake! Why not partake in the festivities? Here's the details in short:

Tickets are $10 (I'd suggest getting them sooner than later, have no idea of how many will be allowed to attend)

You get:  all you can eat cupcakes, fresh local milk, and coffee

Further details:  http://rifoodfights.com/

Tickets: http://rifoodfights.eventbrite.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RIFoodFights
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting a large striped blue and gray scarf
item.name: The Great Cupcake Championship!
